'''''Beyond Bree'' March 1989''' is an issue of ''[[Beyond Bree]]'', edited by [[Nancy Martsch]].

The issue includes Nancy Martsch's article 'The Dick Plotz Letter: Declension of the Quenya Noun', which reproduces the manuscript page "[[The Plotz Declension]]" by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
